character.name: Jorge

appearance.skin: tan weathered skin from years of outdoor work
appearance.distinguishing_features: wrinkled face from sun exposure, weathered hands stained from coffee work, slightly stooped posture

character.occupation: Coffee farmer (cafetero), 45+ years experience, owns small 5-hectare family farm
character.living_situation: Traditional finca (farmhouse) in rural Quindío, Colombia, Coffee Triangle region, with wife María (65)
character.transportation: Jeep Willys (traditional colorful coffee region vehicle), also walks

style.work: Long-sleeve cotton shirt (often plaid), work pants, rubber boots (botas de caucho), wide-brimmed hat (sombrero aguadeño)
style.home: Same basic clothes, may remove hat and boots
style.sleep: Simple pajamas or loose comfortable clothes

family.wife: María, 65 years, homemaker, gray braided hair
family.children: Adult daughter living in city with grandchildren

prompt_templates.base_character: 1boy, elderly man, 67 years old, tan weathered skin, gray short hair, gray mustache, wiry lean build, kind brown eyes, wrinkled face, Colombian farmer, anime style, detailed
prompt_templates.work_attire: 1boy, elderly Colombian man, 67 years old, tan skin, gray hair, gray mustache, wearing plaid long-sleeve shirt, work pants, green rubber boots, wide-brimmed straw hat, coffee farmer, anime style
prompt_templates.home_attire: 1boy, elderly Colombian man, 67 years old, tan skin, gray hair, gray mustache, wearing simple cotton shirt, comfortable pants, chancletas (sandals), relaxed, anime style
prompt_templates.morning_appearance: 1boy, elderly Colombian man, gray hair slightly mussed, wearing white undershirt, waking up, kind expression, anime style

lora_settings.notes: May need elderly male character LoRA or Latino male LoRA. Focus on weathered, kind appearance.

reference_images.strategy: Use existing anime character LoRA from CivitAI for POC
reference_images.alternative_1: Generate 3-5 consistent anime images and use with IP-Adapter
reference_images.alternative_2: Train custom anime LoRA with 15-20 reference images

notes.educational_context: This character represents a Colombian coffee farmer in the traditional Coffee Triangle region. Shows rural agricultural life, elderly perspective, and traditional Colombian culture.
notes.cultural_context: Quindío region (Eje Cafetero), traditional coffee farming, Catholic faith, rural Colombian customs, family values
notes.pedagogical_goal: Teach vocabulary related to coffee farming, rural life, Colombian food and culture, agricultural processes, and elderly daily routines
notes.language_notes: Some Spanish terms naturally used: tinto (coffee), finca (farm), arepa, panela, beneficiadero, etc.
